GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review object containing the information related to that review id

exampleResponse.title: A truly Quacking Game; Quacks of Quedlinburg
exampleResponse.review_body: Ever wish you could try your hand at mixing potions? Quacks of Quedlinburg will have you mixing up a homebrew like no other. Each player buys different ingredients (chips) that are drawn at random to reach the most points, but watch out, you'd better not let your cauldrom explode.

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review object with the votes updated by the amount sent in the patch body

exampleResponse.title: Karma Karma Chameleon
exampleResponse.review_body: Try to trick your friends. If you find yourself being dealt the Chamelean card then the aim of the game is simple; blend in... Meanwhile the other players aim to be as vague as they can to not give the game away

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments related to the specified review id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: when passed valid username and body serves a comment object related to the given review id

GET /api/users.description: serves an object with an array of user objects

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: servesan empty object on successful delete request
